class.name: VoxelDataBlockEnterInfo
class.brief_description: Information sent by a terrain when one of its data blocks enters the area of a [VoxelViewer].
class.description: Information sent by a terrain when one of its data blocks enters the area of a [VoxelViewer]. See [method VoxelTerrain._on_data_block_entered]. Instances of this class must not be stored, as they will become invalid after the call they come from.

method.name: are_voxels_edited
method.description: Tells if voxels in the block have ever been edited. If not, it means the same data can be obtained by running the generator.

method.name: get_lod_index
method.description: Gets which LOD index the data block is in.

method.name: get_network_peer_id
method.description: Gets the network peer ID of the [VoxelViewer] who caused the block to be referenced.

method.name: get_position
method.description: Gets the position of the data block, in data block coordinates (voxel coordinates are obtained by multiplying these coordinates with data block size).

method.name: get_voxels
method.description: Gets access to the voxels in the block.
